metadata.title: CVE-2017-17509 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In HDF5 1.10.1, there is an out of bounds write vulnerability in thefunction H5G__ent_decode_vec in H5Gcache.c in libhdf5.a. For example,h5dump would crash or possibly have unspecified other impact someone opensa crafted hdf5 file.

criterions.comment: hdf5: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
